additional.description: Iblis is known to be a type of ghost that can sense and see where its prey is, even from a distance. If you are close enough to the Iblis, you can hear it use words that other ghosts wonÂ´t
additional.weakness: moves slower when close to its prey

additional.description: They are known to have no interest in anything other than the prey in its sights.
additional.secondary: more aggressive when hunting and close to their prey
additional.weakness: less aggressive when its prey is far away

additional.description: Agash is a Ghost that feeds on cold environments. If an Agash decides to hunt, you can see its breath.
additional.weakness: movement slows down in warmer environments

additional.description: Shades are known as a ghost that are hypersensitive to light. They dislike being in brightly lit environments and always prefers the light to be off.
additional.weakness: lighting up the environment weakens the Shade

additional.description: Unlike other ghosts, Onryos are known as a jealous ghosts. They can choose one person, fall in love with them and attack anyone else.
additional.secondary: more aggressive when others are near their chosen lover
additional.weakness: will not harm their chosen lover

additional.description: The Oni has a special ability that can quickly reduce the sanity of those close to it. It is a very dangerous ghost. If it wants to, it can quickly play with your sanity and decide to kill you.
The Thaye is known as a ghost who can distort the concept of time. As a Thaye ages quickly, it is impossible to know their exact age.
additional.secondary: more aggressive and fast early game
additional.weakness: much slower and less aggressive when becoming older

additional.description: A Raiju is a ghost know to draw strength from solitude. Being alone may mean that you are easier prey for it. Raijus interact less when in a group.
additional.weakness: being together makes the raiju more passive

additional.description: A Mare is a type of ghost that likes to talk, though it has been observed to be less active than other Ghosts.
additional.weakness: will not hunt with someone nearby

additional.description: The Abbadon is widely regarded as the most cunning type of ghost. They will not hunt their prey if they are defending themselves, but will usually hunt the defenseless.
additional.secondary: targets players who cannot defend themself
additional.weakness: very high change to ignore you while holding a crucifix

additional.description: A Revenant is known to be a very dangerous, unpredictable ghost. Regardless of your sanity, it can hunt you down if it feels like it.
additional.secondary: very unstable and hard to predict
additional.weakness: if it decides to stay calm, it makes it easier to find it

additional.description: A Poltergeist is known as a ghost that likes to play with its environment. It can throw objects to lower your sanity.
additional.secondary: can throw multiple items at once, quickly reducing sanity
additional.weakness: calms down if there is nothing to throw

additional.description: Jinns are known to be more active than other ghosts. It has been observed that they're more active if someone is nearby.
additional.secondary: due to their high activity, they are prone to hunting
additional.weakness: due to their high activity, they are easier to detect

additional.description: Hantus are known as ghosts that play with people's minds through their speech. If you somehow manage to talk to one, it will play with your sanity, making you more vulnerable.
additional.secondary: talking to it makes you an easier prey
additional.weakness: if cursed due to talking to it you can remove the curse with sanity pills

additional.description: We still haven't figured out how the Myling is related to fire, but it is known to have an affinity for it. We have observed that it is calmer in environments with fire nearby.
additional.secondary: without fire nearby it will be aggressive
additional.weakness: will put out the first nearby first before hunting

additional.description: A Goryo doesn't interact with ESGs if someone is nearby. Since it's a very rare type of ghost, we don't have much information other than that.
additional.secondary: only interacts with ESG without anyone nearby

additional.description: Demons are known as normally calm, collected ghosts. They have a lower prey drive than other types of ghosts, but if you manage to anger a demon, it will not stop until it kills you.
additional.secondary: hunt wont end untill its prey is dead

additional.description: The Gul is known as a ghost who listens to the conversations between people. The words you choose are important to it.
additional.secondary: can get angry and hunt when swearing
additional.weakness: the less you talk the calmer it is

additional.description: The Yurei is a Ghost that prefers feeding small amounts of energy off multiple People at once, so that it can grow stronger without being noticed immediately
additional.secondary: more likely to hunt when walking in groups
